verbs.description: The U.S .– North Korea situation [V: could] still quickly devolve to where it was in 2017 , despite President Trump ’s recent celebratory tone .

[ARG1: The U.S .– North Korea situation] [ARGM-MOD: could] [ARGM-TMP: still] [ARGM-MNR: quickly] [V: devolve] [ARG4: to where it was in 2017] , [ARGM-ADV: despite President Trump ’s recent celebratory tone] .
The U.S .– North Korea situation could still quickly devolve to [ARG2: where] [ARG1: it] [V: was] [ARGM-TMP: in 2017] , despite President Trump ’s recent celebratory tone .
